resources.string: "In this section you can consult different locations within the Free Zone that you can visit with some information regarding it. "

It is an initiative led by the Barcelona Free Trade Zone Consortium with the aim of promoting and developing the 4.0 industry by promoting an ecosystem for attracting talent, technology and investments in a unique space.

Driven by the CZFB and the Leitat technology center with the support of Fondos FEDER through the Incyde Foundation of the Chambers of Commerce of Spain, it is the first high-tech 3D business incubator in Europe, and aims to incubate the 100 best initiatives linked to additive manufacturing.

The first incubator in Spain dedicated to Industry 4.0 in the field of the value chain of the logistics sector. Its aim is to select the 25 most attractive startups in the world of logistics that want to develop their own technology to enter our incubation program.

The Consorci de la Zona Franca de Barcelona (CZFB) closed an agreement with Correus and Barcelona City Council in 2020 to transform the emblematic Correus building in Via Laietana into a revitalization space economy, digitization and training. We are giving shape to this disruptive project, The New Post Barcelona, ​​which will once again boost our city as an international benchmark for economic and social transformation.
